networking.title: Access Points
networking.text: Have multiple routers or access points wired to get best internet speed throughout your home & office

networking.title: Hard-Wired Internet Solutions
networking.text: We use CAT 7 ethernet cables to provide fast internet to your devices such as TVs and computers. CAT 7 ethernet cables are future proof as they provide up to 10,000 Mb/s speed compare toother CAT 5 or 6 cables that are up to 1000 Mb/s
